title: How do I delete my GSave Overseas account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

If you want to delete your GSave Overseas account, follow the steps below:

**Withdraw all remaining funds**

Make sure you've withdrawn all the funds from your GSave Overseas account. You cannot delete your account if you still have money in your account.

**Request for GSave Overseas account deletion**

To request for deletion of your GSave Overseas account, please reach out to CIMB at + **632 8924 2462.**
